  • Vendor Bundled Extensions (VBEs)

Vendor Bundled Extensions (VBEs)

Edit on GitHub
Log an Issue

Vendor Bundled Extensions (VBEs) are third-party extensions that we have thoroughly tested and included with each supported version of Magento Open Source and Magento Commerce.

Current VBEs include:

  • Amazon Pay
  • dotdigital (formerly Dotmailer)
  • Klarna
  • Vertex
  • Yotpo

Installing or upgrading Magento also installs VBEs, but you may need to set up an account with a vendor to configure and use an extension.

Compatibility

The following table shows VBE version compatibility with Magento:

Supported – version that has been fully tested by Magento and is supported.

Not supported - version that is not compatible with a Magento release.

  Magento 2.3.0 Magento 2.3.1 Magento 2.3.2 Magento 2.3.3 Magento 2.3.4 Magento 2.3.5-p1 Magento 2.4.0
